title: Row Modes
text: The aggregation 'rowMode' defines how the table handles visible rows. The segmented button on the bottom can be used to switch between the different modes. The table in the example is in 'Fixed' mode initially.

title: Fixed Mode
text: A fixed number of rows is displayed.

title: Auto Mode
text: The number of rows displayed in the table is calculated based on the space it is allowed to cover (limited by the surrounding container).

title: Interactive Mode
text: The user can change the number of displayed rows by dragging a resizer.
